title.rendered: Seesaw & Canvas Recorded Trainings for Parents & Guardians

content.rendered:
The District has recorded Seesaw and Canvas training sessions for parents and guardians.  Seesaw is used in grades K-5 and Canvas is used in grades 6-12.

Seesaw 101 for Parents & Guardians: Click here to watch the recording of Seesaw 101 for Parents and Guardians. This session will cover getting your child logged on to his/her Seesaw Account from Home. Setting up your Family Seesaw Account to stay up to date with your child’s classwork. 

Seesaw 102 for Parents & Guardians: Click here to watch the recording of Seesaw 102 for Parents and Guardians. This session will hep you get more involved in your child’s Seesaw Account.  Learn how to click on links and recognize how to help your child stay current with assignments in school and during remote learning.  

Canvas for Parents and Guardians:The session will review how weekly announcements, modules, assignments, feedback, and the calendar are being used in Canvas to assist teacher & student communication, provide access to course content and activities & assignments, and support academic student growth.  You will walk away with helpful tips on how to navigate Canvas to support your student!  Other helpful links:

  • Account Registration and Student Pairing (Observers)
  • Canvas Overview (Observers)
  • Canvas Parent App
